title: Interpretation of a dream about eavesdropping and listening to speech in a dream

preview.html: The great imam, the great jurist and researcher in the interpretation of dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin, believed that seeing a person in his dream and seeing him is eavesdropping on another person. Eavesdropping on someone, and this indicates that the dreamer is doing a lot of bad and unrighteous deeds, and they are talking badly about him. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream for a single woman in detail. Evidence for seeing eavesdropping in a dream by Ibn Siriniri, the great imam, the great jurist and researcher in dream interpretation , Muhammad Ibn Sirin, that seeing a person and seeing him in his dream eavesdropping on another person, this vision symbolizes the hatred that the dreamer receives from the ruler. . Imam Ibn Sirin also believes that seeing a person engaged in trade in his dream is that he is watching someone. This vision confirms the loss of a lot of money related to his business or may also indicate his dismissal from work. As for the person who sees and sees in his dream that he is eavesdropping on people, but he reveals them. This vision symbolizes that the dreamer does not pay attention to what people say about him, and it also shows that the dreamer has bad morals. He is not good and does a lot of bad deeds. But seeing and seeing a person in his dream eavesdropping on some people, this vision shows that he is dishonest and reveals secret things. Miller’s dream interpretation of pirates. The meaning of interception in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. The Imam and jurist Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing eavesdropping in a dream and seeing it It is a sign of hatred and deception. Also, seeing eavesdropping in a dream and seeing it confirms a lack of comfort, insecurity, anxiety, and extreme fear. It is also possible to see someone in a dream and seeing him indicates that he is eavesdropping on someone, which indicates that the dreamer is making a lot of mistakes. And not good deeds. Seeing eavesdroppers in a dream and seeing them is considered an unpleasant, unpleasant and unwanted vision, because it symbolizes that the dreamer is receiving a lot of bad information, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a dream in the basement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing eavesdropping through the window and its interpretationInterpretation of a dream Meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Scientists believe that seeing and seeing someone eavesdropping through a window in a dream, this vision symbolizes that some of his companions are speaking bad words about him. This vision also confirms that the dreamer will be expelled from his job or position, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But If one sees that he is eavesdropping on someone from the window, then this vision confirms that the man and the dreamer have lost a lot of money and faced many crises. Interpretation of a dream about a goose in a dream. The importance of seeing a good reason. Interpretation of seeing a dream about bird droppings in a dream - the symbol of dung in a dream. Agree. Many scholars, jurists and commentators unanimously agree that seeing a person and seeing that he hears good words, this vision symbolizes that the dreamer will gain many blessings and good deeds. It is possible to see wiretapping in a dream, which indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot of happy news. And fun. title: Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a married woman and a single woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a married woman: There are many indications and meanings for seeing eggs in a dream as interpreted by scholars, and there are modern interpretations that were not mentioned by the righteous predecessors. A married woman’s vision of eggs has interpretations, whether there is an indication of her goodness or an indication of evil that may happen, and God Almighty knows that. In our article, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about eggs for a married woman, as you see the interpretation of dreams as a matter of domestication and not glorification and proof, and all of them are matters related to knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a married woman: If a married woman sees eggs and is suffering from problems in childbirth, then seeing eggs indicates improved ovulation for her bear and the success of treatment. Pregnancy, and in other interpretations they say that a married woman seeing a small egg is a sign of the reason for her pregnancy with a girl. As for a woman who sees a large egg in a dream, this is a sign to make her bold. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a married woman. Commentators mentioned that if a married woman sees eggs in a dream and has a strong desire In marriage, this dream is a sign of pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees a large number of eggs in her dream, this is an indication that she will soon become pregnant with a female child. Other interpretations stated that seeing a married woman’s eggs in it indicates a happy and stable married life with her husband. Likewise, seeing married people’s eggs is a sign of good offspring. If a married woman sees broken eggs in a dream, this is a sign of problems with her husband. If a married woman sees that she is buying eggs, this is a sign that she will get what she wants in her work and will reach her goal. If she sees A married woman sees boiled eggs in a dream, then this is a sign that her husband will succeed and excel in his work. If a woman sees in her dream that she gave birth to an egg instead of a fetus, then this is a sign that she will give birth to a male child. If the dreamer sees parrot eggs in her dream, this is evidence that she is an obedient woman. To God Almighty and she is afraid of disobeying Him. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is collecting eggs and placing them in an inappropriate place, this is a sign that she will suffer from bad financial problems or failure in her work. And when a wife sees in a dream that her husband gave her a raw egg, this is a sign that she She will become pregnant soon. If a woman sees raw eggs in a dream along with bad things in the dream, this is a sign of the corruption of her morals, and this is a sign of repentance and a return to obedience to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about sitting with the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs for a married woman In a dream, there are many interpretations and interpretations about a married woman seeing in her dream that she is collecting eggs, and one of these indications is that she will give birth to good offspring in her life, and these are positive indications for interpreting the vision. Likewise, if a married woman sees that she is collecting eggs in a dream and placing them in an inappropriate place, for example, under the bed. In her life and problems arise for her. Likewise, seeing a married woman collecting eggs is a sign of the livelihood that she will have or that she will become pregnant soon. If the woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating bread in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating bread: Dreams are among the fantasies that a person sees in his sleep, and Islamic law divided dreams into several categories, the first of which is that they are true visions of God Almighty, and the second category is that they are the pipes of Satan. We must seek refuge from them and not tell anyone. Because of the repressed desires in the human soul that appear and empty the human mind through dreams, and in the context of this article we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about eating bread. Interpretation of a dream about eating bread: There are many interpretations related to eating bread in a dream, and bread in a dream may have many connotations, and the interpretation varies from one person to another, and circumstances differ from one person to another, so no single interpretation has been adopted, and in this context we will explain the interpretation of a dream about eating bread: If a dream If a person eats warm bread in his dream, this indicates a good life. As for the dream of eating dry bread, it is evidence of the difficulty of life and the goodness of religion. If the bread is made of barley, then eating it when called indicates contentment and asceticism in this world. As for rice bread, eating bread in The dream means that you will stop the situation, disrupt things, and move towards negativity and fall into many difficulties in life. If the bread is made of lentils and beans, then this dream indicates that its owner will fall into extreme poverty and humiliation. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a needle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Eating bread with cheese The interpretation of a dream about eating bread with cheese in a dream shows many indications, the most important of which is the bad circumstances that the dreamer is facing, and perhaps it was an illness, disease, or debts that have accumulated on him, and the topic also shows the narrowness of life, livelihood, and poverty, so the interpretation of a dream about eating bread with cheese is one of the evil dreams. Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream by Ibn Shahina. Ibn Shaheen is one of the imams of interpretation scholars. He has many books containing many dreams and their interpretations, which many people adopt and adopt. Ibn Shaheen relies on the interpretation of dreams on the basis of the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet. Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen interprets seeing a loaf in a dream as removing worries and anxiety, and if a person sees himself in a dream that he cannot eat bread from an unknown place, this means that its pronunciation is approaching, but if it is half a loaf, it is an indication. Half of his life is gone. Ibn Shaheen’s warm bread in a dream indicates comfort in life, and if the bread is very warm, it means worry and anxiety. As for seeing dough in Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, it is one of the signs of Saladin. According to Ibn Shaheen, wheat bread is gold, and rice bread is the state’s stop. See also: Interpretation of dreams about eating dates for single, married, pregnant and divorced women. Interpretation of buying bread in a dream. Interpretation of buying bread in a dream in general indicates food and pleasure, and Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation that he buys bread in a dream and does not pay his due, then he lives with pleasure, and whoever finds in teat. The high price of bread is a sign of the Lord’s corruption. Taking bread and giving it to him in a dream. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, whoever sees a dead person in his dream taking bread from him, then he is in turmoil in his religion and must return to God Almighty and

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about climbing stairs for individuals in different situations. A dream about climbing stairs indicates many meanings. It can indicate diligence and hope and can indicate working to achieve goals. Some have interpreted it as pressures and difficulties that a person faces and sometimes it symbolizes the responsibilities that fall on one’s shoulders. The person may refer to a trip. The interpretation of this dream varies depending on the events in which the dream occurred. A dream can mean success and it can mean unhappiness, and the greater the distance of the stairs, it is a sign of the person's futile effort in his search for the desired goal, as well as the material from which the stairs are made. The length and height of the stairs have interpretations, and we will know this from our article today, and here is the interpretation of this dream from an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs: Whoever sees himself in a dream climbing the stairs, this is evidence of goodness and justice, and that the person who sees him has a lot of legitimate sustenance, and that God will grant him success. A clear victory. Whoever sees that he is climbing an old ladder in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain many goods from his trade, even if there is a quarrel between him and the man, because this quarrel brings many good things. Whoever sees himself going up and down the stairs and then going up and down again in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer is one who is trying to do good for others and that he will achieve what he seeks. As for the sick person who sees in his dream that he is climbing the stairs, this is a sign that his life is over and that God will take him. The person who He sees in a dream that he is quietly climbing the stairs, then this is a sign that his situation and affairs will gradually improve. If one sees in his dream that he is climbing a high ladder, then this is a sign of the high position he will reach or the great goodness he will acquire, and if the dreamer is a person qualified to hold a position, then this It is good news for holding this position. As for seeing climbing a ladder made of iron, this is an indication that the dreamer will obtain a greater degree of knowledge, promotion, or a better job, and this dream may indicate his travels and trips. And wages, this is an indication of the corruption of his religion, and as for seeing climbing a wooden ladder, it indicates the dreamer’s weakness in religion. Whoever sees in his dream that he is climbing endless stairs, this is evidence that the dreamer will reach a high position and gain great virtue and justice in his religion and in worldly affairs. He sees himself climbing the stairs with difficulty, this is a sign of the obstacles that prevent the dreamer from achieving his ambition. As for seeing himself climbing the stairs accompanied by a person known to the dreamer, this is a sign of excellence and success and achieving what he desires. Interpretation of a dream about sunrise stairs for individuals: Stairs in an unmarried girl’s dream show her journey in life and may indicate The basic stages of her life: If a girl sees the stairs in her father’s house, this is a sign of new events that will change her life. However, if she sees the stairs to her lover, friend, or fiancé’s house, then this is a sign of her marriage and may indicate success if she is getting up, but if she is going down, the dream indicates To failure. A dream about a staircase for single people can be interpreted as follows: When an unmarried girl sees herself

title: What is the interpretation of pregnancy in a dream for a girl according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Pregnancy in a dream for a girl. Pregnancy and the birth of good offspring are among the most beautiful blessings that God - the Almighty - gives to His servants. However, if an unmarried girl becomes pregnant without getting married in reality, then this is against the law, customs and traditions in society. The different meanings of this dream and whether it is good for her or not, and this we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. Pregnancy in a dream for a girlThe interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a girl has many implications, the most important of which are what can be clarified through the following: Narrated by Imam Ibn Shaheen - may God have mercy on him. - If a girl sees herself pregnant in her dream, this is a sign of the great benefit that will accrue to her in the coming days, if her stomach swells, and the dream symbolizes that she is earning a lot of money. As for Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, he explained that a dream about pregnancy for an unmarried woman indicates distress. And the anguish that will befall her soon, which may be due to her or disagreements between her family members. Some jurists considered that seeing a pregnancy in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will get married soon and live a happy and stable life with her partner. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Carrying a girl in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that carrying a girl in a dream indicates her nourishment, abundance of kindness, and good morals. If the fiancée sees in her dream that she Pregnant, then this is a sign of her relationship with a good young man who will be a source of help and happiness in her life. Pregnancy in a dream for an engaged girl. If the fiancée sees in her dream that she is pregnant, this is a sign of the anxiety and psychological disorder that she is suffering from at this time in her life, and if she is pregnant with her fiancé, this leads to Many arguments that would happen between them, and he must be in good health, and look at things in the right way so as not to lead to separation. If an attached girl dreams that she is pregnant without her fiancé, then this is good, happiness, and benefit awaiting her in the coming days and good news from the Lord of the Worlds that her life is in the future. . She will be stable with her husband. Pregnancy in a dream for a young girl. If a young woman sees a pregnant woman in her dream, this is evidence that God - Glory be to Him - will grant her pregnancy and childbirth, and this period will pass peacefully and she and her child or daughter will be in a good and lively condition. When a mother sees her young daughter pregnant and giving birth in her dream, this is a sign that she will be able to pay off the debts she has accumulated and the difficult period in her life will end. Pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman with her lover. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a man from her lover, this is a sign. On the crises and disagreements that you will face with him in the coming period. Officially propose to her and he will be honest with her, so there is no need to worry. Interpreters explained that pregnancy in an unmarried woman’s dream by her lover symbolizes the happy life she will enjoy with him and the extent of love, respect and understanding that will exist between them. Pregnancy

When a mother sees her young daughter pregnant and giving birth in her dream, this is a sign that she will be able to pay off the debts she has accumulated and the difficult period in her life will end. Pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman with her lover. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a man from her lover, this is a sign. On the crises and disagreements that you will face with him in the coming period. Officially propose to her and he will be honest with her, so there is no need to worry. Interpreters explained that pregnancy in an unmarried woman’s dream by her lover symbolizes the happy life she will enjoy with him and the extent of love, respect and understanding that will exist between them. Pregnancy

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing monkeys in a dream?  The dream interpretation of a brown monkey and the dream interpretation of eating monkey meat and killing the monkey in a dream

preview.html: Seeing monkeys in a dreamMonkeys are considered one of the famous animals that many people see in some parks, and others find them in their dreams and dreams, which have many different signs, and they are one of the types of animals that many people know, but they are present in the dream as they are in reality, this is what we will know. Through different interpretations about seeing a monkey in a dream and its different meanings. Interpretation of monkeys in a dream for a manIn the event that the dreamer sees that someone is giving him this animal or giving him a gift in a dream, and that the person was very close to him in real life, this is a sign of deception and cunning that This person will carry it, and the dreamer must take care of him or deal with him. But if he sees in his dream that he is eating his meat, then it is one of the interpretations of bad dreams, and indicates anxiety, distress, distress, poverty, need, and big problems. Catching monkeys in a dream If he is seen chasing him from a tree, then Its interpretation is good and good and indicates that there is something good and useful in his life in general, or that there is something that he really wants and is seeking to achieve. As for the dreamer who sees that he is seeking to marry him, it is a sign that he is far from God or that he is committing a great or major sin, and God knows best. If a married man sees a monkey in a dream, this is closely related to his married life, which indicates ruin and separation from his wife, especially if she is dark brown in color. Interpretation of monkeys in a dream for a single young man When a young man sees a large group of them in his dream, this is evidence of the return of the newcomer near From the dreamer or a sign of distress and distress for those close to him. But if he dreams that he is sitting next to him, this is evidence of problems, crises, and sorrows, and it may indicate that something bad will happen in the life of the young man. Seeing monkeys in a dream and marrying them. If she sees herself as if she is going to marry him, this is a great sin or immorality. She must repent, ask for forgiveness, and approach God Almighty in the coming period. But if he sees him and he is short or short, this means that there is a person close to him who carries deception and cunning towards him, as he is characterized by hypocrisy and cunning. But if it is a group of them, and they are small, then it is a sign of harm. A large dream or a loss of money, except for one of the people close to the dreamer in reality, and not from him. Ibn Sirin also said: If one man sees it, it symbolizes poverty, need, lack of money, and a difficult financial situation, or he may be far from religion. If he sees him, he attacks him or tries to bite him, This is a symbol of a health crisis. Interpretation of monkeys in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees that there is only one of them in her house, this indicates that there is a person in her life who is deceiving and deceiving her or is working to put her in some plans. If she sees a large group of them in the house Or on the street, this means that she is exposed to some problems in real life and it may indicate that there are people trying to put her in various problems or between her and her husband. If she sees her husband giving it to her, this indicates that he is lying and deceiving her in many matters, and it may appear that he is a hypocrite. Or a traitor

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing eyeliner in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Eyeliner is one of the things that many women do for the purpose of beauty and adornment, in addition to this natural eyeliner that protects them from many diseases. Therefore, eyeliner in a dream is considered a vision that carries many positive meanings for the dreamer, whether he is a man or a woman in the dream, as we will explain to you. Interpretation of dreaming about breastfeeding in a dream... the proximity of childbirth and recovery from illness. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a single girl: an unmarried girl who does not She is in a relationship and wants to get married. Eye makeup in her dream foretells that she is approaching engagement in the near future. Eye makeup in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that this girl will obtain a distinguished position at work in the near future. Eyeliner in a single woman’s dream can be a sign On the vertical superiority she deserves this year. Ibn Sirin says that a girl buying kohl in a dream is one of the dreams that foretells her that her desires and dreams will be fulfilled. An unmarried girl wearing kohl in a dream is one of the signs that this girl will marry the man of her dreams and hopes for the coming period without problems, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dream about wind in a dream... the end of problems and stability. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a married woman. A woman who sees herself wearing eyeliner in a dream is a woman who has a special status with her husband and has all the appreciation and respect for her. If the dreamer suffers from some diseases in Currently, seeing him in a dream promises that he will recover from this disease in the near future. If the dreamer is suffering from worries, problems, and sorrows at this time, then the comforter in her dream portends that these sorrows will end once and for all and the arrival of joy after the period of hardships that has passed. In it. For a woman who wants to get pregnant and have children, seeing her tanned in a dream foretells that she will become pregnant in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams about gasoline in a dream... ease of childbirth and labor. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dream interpreters believe that applying eyeliner in a dream for a pregnant woman It is one of the signs that she will give birth to a beautiful girl. Eyeliner in a dream and in a pregnant woman’s dream foretells to her that the time of childbirth has come and is approaching, and it also promises her that it will be an easy birth, God willing. Eyeliner in a dream indicates good health that the dreamer and the newborn enjoy. Interpretation of a vision A boiled egg in a dream... marriage and illness. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a divorced woman. Dream interpreters confirm that eyeliner in a dream for a divorced woman indicates a noticeable improvement in her situation in the coming period. Eyeliner in a dream also indicates getting rid of the anguish, sadness, and pain that she feels. This woman is at that time in her life. Putting eyeliner in the eyes of a divorced woman indicates that she will achieve her dreams that she tried to achieve in the previous period. Eyeliner also shows a divorced woman that her life will change positively in the near future. A divorced woman who denies herself in a dream could be one One of the signs of her return to her husband is...

title: Interpretation of seeing cats in a single woman’s dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing cats in a single woman's dream Seeing cats in a dream has many different meanings that differ from one case to another according to the dreamer, and in light of the many interpretations of the dream of seeing kittens in a dream, let us get to know all the interpretations related to seeing a cat in a dream. Dream. Seeing cats in a single woman's dream An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that a kitten attacks and bites her, but the bite was small and did not harm her, this is an indication that there are many people close to her who are jealous of her, but she will escape from this harm and damage. If the dreamer has a kitten and sees it in a dream sleeping motionless, the vision indicates a state of calm and tranquility in the dreamer's life. Seeing a kitten in a dream symbolizes the birth of a brother or sister to the dreamer in reality. If the dreamer's mother has passed the age of pregnancy and childbirth and sees a cat in a dream, this indicates abundant kindness and legitimate sustenance. Seeing a kitten in a single life symbolizes her desire to marry and that God will grant her righteous offspring, and God has promised her that she will have more daughters than sons. Seeing cats in a single woman's dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees in her dream the interpretation of seeing kittens in a dream for a single woman and in reality she had a company or institution and saw in her dream a group of cats in her workplace. Be careful and try not to trust all people and rely on yourself. Seeing cats attacking a single woman's house indicates that her house has been robbed and an attempt to steal all the furniture and property. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of seeing cats in an unmarried woman's dream, if they are beautiful and do not move, as evidence of happiness, joy, psychological comfort, calm and inner peace in the dreamer's life. Seeing cats in a dream and being afraid of them for singles If an unmarried woman sees a lot of cats but is afraid of them in a dream, this indicates her lack of self-confidence and that she is a weak personality and is affected by the words of those around her and works with them. And negativity because she cannot confront those who oppose her. If the cat was black in the dream and the girl was afraid when she saw it, this indicates her distance from God Almighty and that she took the path of disobedience and then the path of justice and reward. This dream came, which is considered her awareness of returning and getting closer to God and persevering in her prayers and knowing all religious matters. Seeing angry cats in a dream Seeing angry cats in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the presence of many problems and difficulties in the dreamer's life that he cannot solve. If the dreamer was a student who was studying and saw small cats in a dream, this indicates her fear of exams and feeling tense and anxious about this matter, but God reassures her that all this will pass. Seeing angry cats in a dream symbolizes the viewer's inability to make many decisions in his life and resort to consulting others in these fateful decisions. Seeing colored cats in a single person's dream When you see small cats in wonderful and happy colors in your dream, especially for a single girl, the vision shows the arrival of joy and happiness in her life

Dream: Seeing cats in a single woman’s dream: An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that a small cat attacks her and bites her, but the bite was small and did not harm her, is an indication that there are many people close to her who are jealous of her, but she will escape from this. Damage and damage. If the dreamer has a small cat and sees it in a dream sleeping motionless, then the vision indicates a state of calm and tranquility in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a small cat in a dream symbolizes the birth of a brother or sister for the dreamer in reality. In the event that the dreamer’s mother exceeds the age of pregnancy. And giving birth and seeing a cat in a dream, this indicates abundant kindness and legitimate strength. Seeing a small cat in one’s life symbolizes her desire to get married and that God will give her good offspring, and God has promised her that she will give birth to more daughters than sons. Seeing cats in a dream for Ibn Sirin sees a son In her dream, Sirin interprets seeing kittens in a dream for a single woman. In reality, she had a company or institution, and in her dream she saw a group of kittens in her workplace. Be careful and try not to trust all people and rely on yourself. Seeing cats attacking a single woman’s house indicates that her house has been robbed and an attempt is made to steal all the furniture and possessions. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of seeing cats in an unmarried woman’s dream, if she is beautiful and does not move, as evidence of... Happiness, joy, psychological comfort, tranquility and inner peace in the dreamer’s life. Seeing cats in a dream and being afraid of them for single people. If an unmarried woman sees a lot of cats but is afraid of them in the dream, this indicates her lack of self-confidence and that she is a weak personality and is affected by the words of those around her and works with them. And negativity because it cannot confront those who oppose it. If the cat was black in the dream and the girl was afraid when he saw it, this indicates her distance from God Almighty and that she took the path of disobedience and then the path of justice and reward. This dream came, which is considered an awareness for her to return and get closer to God and persevere in her prayers and knowledge. All religious matters. Seeing angry cats in a dream. Seeing angry cats in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that there are many problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life that he cannot solve. If the dreamer is a student who was studying and saw small cats in a dream, this indicates her fear of exams and feeling stressed. She is worried about this matter, but God reassures her that all this will pass. Seeing angry cats in a dream symbolizes the viewer’s inability to make many decisions in his life and resort to consulting others in these fateful decisions. Seeing colorful cats in an individual’s dreamWhen you see kittens with wonderful colors And happy in your dream, especially for one girl, the vision shows the arrival of joy and happiness in her life
